title: 11/06/20 HOUR 3- Mike Florio
itunes:title: 11/06/20 HOUR 3- Mike Florio
description:
Mike Florio tells Dan what the Raiders did wrong to receive such a heavy fine from the NFL. Mike says it was a accumulation of events. Mike says that teams can expect a more aggressive discipline each time they break covid19 protocol.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
